title: Shinya Sakoi
text:
is a former <a href="Japan">Japan</a>ese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Playing career.
Sakoi was born in <a href="Hiroshima%20Prefecture">Hiroshima Prefecture</a> on May 8, 1977. After graduating from <a href="Juntendo%20University">Juntendo University</a>, he joined newly was promoted to <a href="J1%20League">J1 League</a> club, <a href="FC%20Tokyo">FC Tokyo</a> in 2000. He played several matches as defensive midfielder in first season. However he could not play at all in the match in 2001. In July 2001, he moved to <a href="J2%20League">J2 League</a> club <a href="Yokohama%20FC">Yokohama FC</a> on loan. He became a regular player as center back immediately and played many matches until 2002. In 2003, he returned to FC Tokyo. However he could not play at all in the match. In 2004, he moved to J2 club <a href="Montedio%20Yamagata">Montedio Yamagata</a> on loan. He became a regular player as right side back from summer. In 2005, he returned to FC Tokyo. Although he played several matches, he could hardly play in the match and retired end of 2005 season.
